work.name: InfiniGlobe

work.name: Boeing
highlights: Developed a comprehensive desktop application to automate document generation, accelerating spacecraft database deliveries and enhancing overall productivity.
Conceptualized and implemented a streamlined process for generating data verification SQL queries for new space programs.
Enhanced software development methodologies by integrating continuous integration via Jenkins, improving code quality and project velocity.

work.name: InfiniGlobe
highlights: Spearheaded the development of RESTful APIs and microservices using NodeJS, PHP, and Java, enabling seamless integration of back-end services and enhancing system interoperability.

Orchestrated the design and implementation of a cutting-edge software architecture for automatic client data migration, leveraging batch and real-time processing techniques to reduce migration time from 3 days to 50 minutes.

Built sophisticated analytic services and dashboards that extracted key performance indicators (KPIs), providing actionable recommendations and contributing to improved risk management of legal vendors and outside counsel.
Enabled real-time monitoring of key business metrics through custom-built dashboards, fostering a culture of transparency and continuous improvement.

work.name: Irvine Valley College

Adapted tutoring methods to accommodate individual student learning styles.
